name: Tony Adam
overview:
Tony Adam is currently the Co-Founder/CEO of Eventup and was recently an EIR at Science.
Tony Adam is an Internet entrepreneur and has been in the technology industry for over 10 years. He has a large amount of technology and digital media experience working for many of the best brands on the Internet, such as PayPal, Yahoo!, and, most recently, Myspace, while also being an advisor to many startups in Los Angeles. He has a wide variety of technology experience including product development, social design, web development and has built a name for himself as one of the top Traffic Acquisition people around, specifically SEO. Tony is a regular speaker at technology and marketing conferences like SMX and SXSW Interactive.
